2025.title: Zoom app arrives on Meta Quest
2025.description: On July 9, Meta launched an official Zoom app for the Meta Quest platform, enabling users to attend and host virtual meetings in VR using avatars and Horizon Workrooms integration.

2025.title: AR in VR: 15 Years of AWE with Ori Inbar
2025.description: At AWE USA 2025, Ori Inbar reflected on 15 years of the Augmented World Expo, highlighting the evolution of immersive tech and the convergence of AR and VR under one XR ecosystem.

2025.title: Meta rebrands VR/MR content under 'Mixed Reality'
2025.description: In early 2025, Meta began marketing all Horizon and Quest content under the unified term 'Mixed Reality' to reflect the blending of physical and digital worlds in its platform vision.

2025.title: Meta Reality Labs sales grew 40% in 2024
2025.description: A leaked internal memo from Meta reveals that Reality Labs saw a 40% increase in revenue during 2024, driven largely by Quest 3S and holiday season performance.

2025.title: Meta posts record $1.083B in Q4 2024 XR revenue
2025.description: Meta's Reality Labs achieved its highest-ever quarterly revenue in Q4 2024, with $1.083 billion in earnings attributed to strong Quest 3S sales and expanding enterprise usage.

2025.title: Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition release
2025.description: Meta and Xbox launched the limited‑edition Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition on June 24 for $399, bundled with Xbox Series controller and Game Pass, optimized for Xbox Cloud Gaming on VR.

2025.title: Google Android XR & Project Moohan unveiled
2025.description: At Google I/O 2025, Google unveiled Android XR platform featuring Gemini AI, hand/eye tracking, and showcased Project Moohan mixed‑reality headset co-developed with Samsung, launching mid‑2025.

2025.title: Samsung Project Moohan previewed at Galaxy Unpacked
2025.description: In July at Galaxy Unpacked, Samsung previewed its Android XR headset Project Moohan, featuring Snapdragon XR2+ Gen 2, high‑res OLED displays, launching in South Korea late 2025.

2025.title: Samsung AR/VR headset to outshine Vision Pro
2025.description: A June supply‑chain leak suggests Samsung’s 2025 AR/VR headset will feature displays surpassing Apple Vision Pro, signaling high‑end hardware competition.

2025.title: Meta ‘Loma’ headset partnerships
2025.description: Meta is collaborating with Disney, A24, and Lightstorm to produce exclusive immersive content for its upcoming ‘Loma’ AR‑style headset targeted for 2026 release.

2025.title: AWE USA 2025 showcases AI-powered XR demos
2025.description: At AWE USA in June, exhibitors presented Qualcomm’s AR chip with on‑device AI, XREAL Android‑XR glasses, Sony XYN headset (3552 × 3840 resolution), NeuralDisplay eye‑tracking, and more.

2025.title: Elsewhere Electric VR game launches
2025.description: Indie title Elsewhere Electric, an asymmetric co-op VR/mobile puzzle game, is scheduled for summer 2025 release on Meta Quest and SteamVR.

2025.title: zSpace Imagine AR/VR laptop debuts
2025.description: In January 2025, zSpace launched the Imagine AR/VR laptop—an all‑in‑one spatial computer for K–12 education, continuing its headset‑free Inspire series.

2025.title: AR/VR headset market grows 18% Q1 2025
2025.description: IDC reports AR/VR headset shipments rose by 18.1% year‑over‑year in Q1 2025, signaling recovery driven by mixed reality and enterprise adoption.
